sn35.138:4.2: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.138:4.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati … pe …
sn35.138:4.9: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati … pe …
sn35.138:4.12: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.138:4.13: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṃ imasmiṃ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ taṃ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya, api nu tumhākaṃ evamassa:
sn35.138:4.14: ‘amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karotī’”ti?
sn35.138:4.17: “Na hi no etaṃ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti.
sn35.138:4.20: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati … pe …
sn35.138:4.23: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati … pe …
sn35.138:4.26: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
